content.para: The 3.8.1 release brings a number of minor features and fixes several issues.

td.p: The STC clustering has been improved. It now supports stemming algorithms and picks the representative phrase from a set of stem-equivalent versions. The algroithm now respects stop labels dictionary.

tr.td: Webapp's query word highlighter is now configurable/ replaceable.

td.p: The default highlighter that comes with the webapp now has more tuning options (custom sanitizing regexp pattern, custom pattern for ignoring certain expressions).

tr.td: Workbench supports overrides of components and attributes.

td.p: This can be used to customize and tweak initial attributes of document sources and algorithms.
There was an issue with proper ordering of multi-lingual clusters when FLATTEN_ALL option was selected. The webapp did not support non-numeric document identifiers.

content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA
